} body#layout #settings, body#layout #HTML4, body#layout #HTML30, body#layout .igniplex, body#layout .footers { display: inline-block; } body#layout #header, body#layout .menu, body#layout .footers, body#layout .credit { clear: both; } body#layout { padding: 100px 20px 20px; } body#layout div.section { border-radius: 7px; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 15px 25px; } body#layout .section h4 { font-size: 20px; letter-spacing: .5px; margin: 0 0 15px; text-transform: capitalize; } body#layout .widget-content { border-radius: 7px; margin-bottom: 5px; } body#layout .editlink.icon { z-index: 99; } body#layout .s { position: static; } body#layout #license { background-color: #caffe4; } body#layout header:before { content: 'IGNIPLEX v3'; color: #009688; font: normal 400 28px Arial, sans-serif; top: 25px; } body#layout header:after { content: 'Premium Blogger theme by protemplates.org'; color: #666; font: normal 400 14px Arial, sans-serif; top: 60px; } body#layout header:before, body#layout header:after { height: 30px; left: 0; margin: 0 auto; position: absolute; right: 0; text-align: center; display: block; font-size: 13px; white-space: nowrap; text-decoration: underline; } body#layout #HTML1 .widget-content .editlink.icon, body#layout #HTML2 .widget-content .editlink.icon { background-color: #fdfdfd;
